comment.author: 9683553@N07
comment._content: Interesting. This is the area of the foreshore that is being currently taken over by the caravan park, and denied public access, one of many in recent times.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/imbala] From the curve of the creek I think it is looking south from the road bridge towards the pedestrian bridge; caravan park on the right. ie the reverse view of what you are suggesting. Google Maps street view - g.co/maps/gd7n8 . I wonder if the man on the bridge with his (grand?) children was in the original photo?
